name: endless bummer tote
description: 100% unbleached tote with handprinted text. This listing is for the regular sized tote (on the left of the top photo; JUMBO size is available by clicking here). Tote features a twill weave and measures 15.5" wide by 15" tall. 24" inch straps. Gussets at bottom. A nice, sturdy tote, perfect for your essentials. Handwash in cold water. Tote can be ironed; we recommend placing a piece of cotton or linen fabric over the lettering when ironing the front. Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive.

name: thunder in our hearts tote
description: 100% unbleached cotton tote with handprinted line from "Running Up That Hill (A Deal with God)" by Kate Bush. Handprinted. Tote features a twill weave and measures 15.5" wide by 15" tall. 24" inch straps. Gussets at bottom. A nice, sturdy tote, perfect for your essentials. This tote tends to elicit smiles and fun commentary from strangers. Handwash in cold water. Tote can be ironed; we recommend placing a piece of cotton or linen fabric over the lettering when ironing the front. Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive. Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know! First image courtesy of Hannah of Foxtail & Fern.

name: endless bummer tote, JUMBO SIZED
description: 100% unbleached tote with handprinted text. This listing is for a JUMBO sized tote! Regular sized is available by clicking here. Tote measures 20" wide by 16" tall. 24" inch straps. Gussets at bottom. A nice, sturdy tote, perfect for your essentials. This canvas is 10 oz., which is really nice and heavy (our regular totes are 7oz., so this one is pretty special). Handwash in cold water. Tote can be ironed; we recommend placing a piece of cotton or linen fabric over the lettering when ironing the front. Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive.

name: moon print
description:
Print with handprinted graphic taken from a Victorian stereoview card and text from "A Minha Menina" by the Brazilian band Os Mutantes.

Black and gold ink on acid-free Maidstone warm white paper (90lb), with deckle edge.

Paper measurements 15 1/2 inches tall x 11 3/4 inches wide, design measures 10x10 inches.

Sized to comfortably fit a standard Ikea Ribba frame without a mat.

Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive. Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know!

name: thunder in our hearts tote, blush dip dye
description:
100% unbleached tote with handprinted line from "Running Up That Hill (A Deal with God)" by Kate Bush. This tote has been hand-dyed in a delicate peachy, blush dye. It's subtle, but very beautiful, and so perfect for summer.

Because these are done by hand, there will be slight variations in the pattern left by the dye and in the shade. Also, please be aware that these get pretty wrinkled during the dye process. We do our best to iron them, but they will arrive slightly crinkled. With use, the bag will soften and the creases will come out (promise).

Handprinted. Tote features a twill weave and measures 15.5" wide by 15" tall. 24" inch straps. Gussets at bottom. A nice, sturdy tote, perfect for your essentials. This tote tends to elicit smiles and fun commentary from strangers.

Handwash in cold water. Tote can be ironed; we recommend placing a piece of cotton or linen fabric over the lettering when ironing the front.

These totes are made to order so please allow up to one week before shipping.

Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive.  Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know!

name: the mini meow with art by sonja ahlers
description: 100% unbleached cotton tote with text written by artist Sonja Ahlers, author of The Selves and Fatal Distraction. Learn to say "meow" in Japan, France, Denmark, Iceland, and more! Handprinted. Tote features a twill weave and measures 13" wide by 13" tall. Gusset at bottom. A nice, sturdy tote, perfect for your essentials, or for a kid to carry around. Handwash in cold water. Tote can be ironed; we recommend placing a piece of cotton or linen fabric over the lettering when ironing the front. Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive. Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know!

name: photographic print, fog 1, 6x8"
description:
Photographic print of an original taken with a Polaroid Spectra and expired soft tone film. Printed on Fuji Crystal Archive paper.

6x8" in size. Can be cropped to fit in 5x7" frames.

Please note that colours may appear slightly different depending on your monitor.

This listing is for 1 print only. If you would like more than one 6x8" print, please contact us (price is 2 for $15).

Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive. Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know!

name: light as a feather: venus (SOLD OUT)
description: 100% silk scarf with digitally printed black and white image of the Gallery of Ancient Statues in Naples (with Venus of Gallipede pictured prominently). Please note that we ship from Canada and items may take 5-10 business days to arrive. Also, we do not mail paper receipts, but if you would like one, please let us know! Photos by Anja Verdugo.
